scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist && yarn run build:types && yarn run build:css && yarn run build:js
scripts.build:js: tsup src/index.ts --format esm --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json && node ../../../scripts/write-artifacts-manifest.mjs --dir dist esmEntry=index.js classModule=index.js css=touchspin-bootstrap5.css
scripts.build:test: yarn run build:deps && node ../../../scripts/guard-prod-build.mjs packages/core packages/renderers/bootstrap5 && tsc -p tsconfig.testbuild.json && sass src/styles/touchspin-bootstrap5.scss ../../../devdist/renderers/bootstrap5/touchspin-bootstrap5.css --style=expanded --no-source-map && tsup src/Bootstrap5Renderer.ts --format iife --global-name Bootstrap5Renderer --sourcemap --target es2020 --outDir ../../../devdist/renderers/bootstrap5/iife --external=none && node ../../../scripts/write-artifacts-manifest.mjs --dir ../../../devdist/renderers/bootstrap5 esmEntry=index.js classModule=Bootstrap5Renderer.js iifeEntry=iife/Bootstrap5Renderer.global.js css=touchspin-bootstrap5.css && node ../../../scripts/extract-framework-assets.mjs --renderer bootstrap5
scripts.watch: concurrently "tsc -p tsconfig.build.json --watch --emitDeclarationOnly" "tsup src/index.ts --format esm --watch --sourcemap --target es2020 --tsconfig tsconfig.build.json" "yarn watch:css"
scripts.test: node ../../../scripts/pre-test.mjs packages/renderers/bootstrap5/tests && PLAYWRIGHT_TSCONFIG=../../../tsconfig.playwright.json TS_BUILD_TARGET=dev playwright test --config=../../../playwright.config.ts packages/renderers/bootstrap5/tests --reporter=list
